bibl.title: The Desert Hinterland of Qasr Ibrim.

bibl.title: Qasr Ibrim, Between Egypt and Africa. Studies in Cultural Exchange (NINO Symposium, Leiden, 11-12 December 2009)

bibl.seg: Hans Barnard, The Desert Hinterland of Qasr Ibrim.

J. van der Vliet & J.L. Hagen (edd.), with the assistance of C.H. van Zoest & L.E. van de Peut, Qasr Ibrim, Between Egypt and Africa. Studies in Cultural Exchange (NINO Symposium, Leiden, 11-12 December 2009) = Egyptologische Uitgave. 26 (Leuven, 2013) pp. 83-103, 10 figg.
